description: There's nothing like a warming soup on a chilly evening. This Mexican-style bean soup recipe is loaded with beans and beef for a satisfying dinner.
name: Mexican-Style Bean Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800 g Macro Organic tomatoes diced no added salt
400 g black beans no added salt
0.66 cup Woolworths smokey chipotle cheddar & tasty cheese shredded blend

recipeInstructions.text: Divide soup among bowls. Top with sour cream, tortillas, cheese, avocado and coriander. Season with pepper and serve with lime wedges.
